about_the_game:
Exsys is a beat 'em up that combines Action RPG and fighting game elements to create a unique, flexible, deep combat system.

Feature

  • Free Combo system:
    Mix and match any moves to create your combo to suit your play style.
  • Active Skill System:
    Loot and equip an active skill and execute the skill using a fighting game-style command system to perform the move and help you in combat.
    Mix, match, and order a skill with the same command to create a chain of moves that execute in order.
  • Item system:[/b[Use items to alter your stats, gain a short benefit, etc., to help in the fight.
  • Manage Active Skill and Items to create your arsenal and deliver your fighting style.
  • Item stash:
    Store items in the stash for your next character.
  • Resouce System:
    Gather resources around the game stage and use them to solve puzzles.
  • Permadeath system:
    Your character lives only once. If your character dies, you lose everything on that character and start the new game with a new character.
